title: Caroms
creator_credit: Crystal Gandrud and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Animation is used to exhibit the relationship between a carom an a reflection. This principle is used to solve elementary geometric inequalities, and to explore Fagano’s problem: To find a triangle of minimum perimeter that can be inscribed in a given acute-angled triangle. Suitable for upper secondary level.
